title: Interstellar Favorite Superstar - Novel Updates
tags: Black Belly   Cooking   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dreams   Familial Love   Futuristic Setting   Hackers   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Outer Space   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   Writers
author: 沈青
description:
Entering the interstellar era, Su Tan wrote novels, became a celebrity, hosted and ate food, and began to dominate the interstellar entertainment circle. 

Until one day, the star empire's strongest / anorexic / cold abstinence emperor ate his gourmet food ---

And! Became! Fat!

Emperor, “Fine, marry him, and I will punish him personally.” 

Su Tan, “? ?”>
